attributes.action: Put pressure on the Chinese Government over the treatment of Uyghur Muslims
attributes.additional_details: 70-80% of inhabitants in these regions have been taken to concentration camps and being subjected to horrific torture and the Chinese government are allowing this and hiding this from the public. All the people that have passed away have been cremated to limit evidence of these atrocities. By signing this petition we can get this discussed at least in parliament.
attributes.background: Muslims in china specifically Turkec and Uyghur muslims have been subjected to horrific imprisonment and being forced to consume foods and drinks such as pork and alcohol in these prisons all because they are muslims. They are not allowed to practice their religion which is a basic human right.Sign.
